name: Iluvien
indications: iluvien corticosteroid indicated : treatment diabetic macular edema ( dme ) patients previously treated course corticosteroids clinically significant rise intraocular pressure . ( 1.1 ) treatment chronic non-infectious uveitis affecting posterior segment eye . ( 1.2 )
contraindications: ophthalmic intravitreal injection . ( 2.1 ) intravitreal injection procedure carried aseptic conditions . ( 2.2 ) following intravitreal injection , patients monitored elevation intraocular pressure endophthalmitis . ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions: iluvien® ( fluocinolone acetonide intravitreal implant ) 0.19 mg supplied sterile , single-use preloaded applicator 25-gauge needle , packaged tray sealed lid inside carton . ndc 68611-190-02
indications_original: ILUVIEN is a corticosteroid indicated for: the treatment of diabetic macular edema (DME) in patients who have been previously treated with a course of corticosteroids and did not have a clinically significant rise in intraocular pressure. (1.1) the treatment of chronic non-infectious uveitis affecting the posterior segment of the eye. (1.2)
contraindications_original: For ophthalmic intravitreal injection. (2.1) The intravitreal injection procedure should be carried out under aseptic conditions. (2.2) Following the intravitreal injection, patients should be monitored for elevation in intraocular pressure and for endophthalmitis. (2.2)
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
ILUVIEN® (fluocinolone acetonide intravitreal implant) 0.19 mg is supplied in a sterile, single-use preloaded applicator with a 25-gauge needle, packaged in a tray sealed with a lid inside a carton.
                  NDC 68611-190-02
adverseReactions_original: Ocular or Periocular Infections (4.1) Glaucoma (4.2) Hypersensitivity (4.3)
